title: NYC Crime Report 14 2016-01-26 Mike Dowd Joe Lozito MP4 MP3
description:
*** CAUTION: 100% UNCENSORED CONTENT!!! ***

-NOT FOR VIEWING BY CHILDREN OR THE FAINT OF HEART-

The only comedy show dedicated to coverage of true crime in New York City. Host Pat Dixon - along with a revolving guest list of NYC-based attorneys, reporters, cops and comedians - provides a decidedly irreverent, dark and unflinching tour of true crime in the city. Ripped from the blood-splattered headlines of NYC's tabloid press and broadcast from the ACN Studio in New York City; this is a one of a kind show that documents the farcical evolving chaos of the new Rome.

Guests: Mike Dowd, Joe Lozito

Episode 14: Former NYPD officer, Mike Dowd, described as "New York's most corrupt cop,â€ joins Pat and Mandy at the NYCCR desk. They discuss the blizzard, local news headlines and Mike Dowd takes questions. All on the show that gives you a reason to live, visit http://www.crimereport.nyc to vote on this yearâ€™s NYC Crime Report Awards.
